title: Quantum Info&Quant Comp
description: Introduction to quantum computing and quantum information theory, formalism of quantum mechanics, quantum gates, algorithms, measurements, coding, and information. Physical realizations and experiments. Crosslisted with PHYS 4782.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2605 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2550 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T
